Html:
Hi, your project its great.
But
Im trying to create a pdf using a  XSTL that has WordML "markup",

¿Do you have some idea about how to get a PDF, using FO.NET?

Thanks

Hi

I have not really ever studied WordML, but I know it is just XML so in theory it should be possible to process it using XSLT and create XSL:FO.  This would require you to write an XSLT stylesheet to convert from one vocabulary to the next.  I have no doubt that WordML will not map 100% to the features supported by FO.NET, so it is likely that you will have to compromise here or there.

In a nutshell, yes it sounds possible, no it is not supported already in FO.NET, it will likely take a significant effort.  Sorry I can't be of more help.

Mark
